Package org.melior.context.transaction

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transactional<T>
    Create transactional incarnations of processors, callables and runnables.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    An argument that may be added to the transaction context of a thread during the processing of a transaction.
    BatchTransaction<T>
    Performs the processing of a BatchProcessor in the scope of a transaction.
    CallableTransaction<T>
    Calls a Callable in the scope of a transaction.
    NoReturnCallableTransaction<T>
    Calls a NoReturnCallable in the scope of a transaction.
    RunnableTransaction<T>
    Runs a Runnable in the scope of a transaction.
    SingletonTransaction<T>
    Performs the processing of a SingletonProcessor in the scope of a transaction.
    TransactionContext
    Implements a transaction context for a thread to track the current transaction that is being processed by the thread.
